metadata.feature_description: Quick edit toolbar for managing posts directly from the view interface

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Display edit bar for authorized users

steps.action: Logged in as host user and navigated to News page with Publisher module
steps.expected: Edit bar should be visible at the top of the page for authorized users
steps.actual: Edit bar is displayed at the top with Settings button, Create a Post button, and other controls

steps.action: Clicked Settings button to verify edit bar functionality
steps.actual: Settings panel expanded showing Display Mode and Enable Comments options

steps.action: Navigated to a post detail view
steps.expected: Edit bar should show Edit Post button in Detail view mode
steps.actual: Edit bar displayed with Edit Post button visible on the right side

steps.action: Clicked Edit Post button from the edit bar
steps.expected: Should enter edit mode for the post
steps.actual: Entered edit mode with full edit bar options: Delete, Edit Post Details, Change Author, Close buttons, and editing info message

steps.action: In edit mode, clicked Delete button from the edit bar
steps.expected: Confirmation dialog should appear before deleting
steps.actual: Delete confirmation dialog appeared with message 'Are you sure you want to delete the post?' and Yes/No buttons

steps.expected: Dialog should close without deleting the post
steps.actual: Dialog closed and post remained intact in edit mode

steps.action: Navigated back to list view and clicked Settings button
steps.expected: Settings panel should have workflow options for post status management
steps.actual: Settings panel displayed with Workflow dropdown showing options: Direct Publish, Save Draft, Content Approval

steps.action: Expanded Settings panel to view all workflow options
steps.expected: Full workflow configuration should be visible
steps.actual: Settings panel showed Display Mode, Enable Comments, and Workflow dropdown with all publishing workflow options

steps.action: Logged out of the system to test as anonymous user
steps.expected: Edit bar should NOT be visible to unauthorized users
steps.actual: After logging out, the edit bar is not displayed. Only the post content is visible without any editing controls

steps.action: Resized browser to 768x600 (tablet viewport) after logging back in
steps.expected: Edit bar should adapt to smaller screen sizes
steps.actual: Edit bar adapted to the narrower viewport, maintaining functionality with buttons appropriately sized and positioned

observations: Code analysis reveals keyboard shortcuts are NOT implemented in EditBarManager.js. The only keyboard-related binding found was in PublishingManager.js for textarea valueUpdate ('afterkeydown'), which is standard KnockoutJS binding for text input, not a keyboard shortcut feature.
The edit bar visibility is controlled by the ShowEditBar property which checks both edit mode state and user permissions (CanEdit property).

Edit bar buttons vary by ViewMode: List mode shows Settings and Create Post; Detail mode shows Edit Post; Edit/Create modes show Delete, Edit Post Details, Change Author, and publishing workflow buttons.
The edit bar uses KnockoutJS for data binding and panel toggle animations with CSS transitions.
